Package org.jutil.gui

Class Gui

java.lang.Object
org.jutil.gui.Gui
public class Gui extends Object
Utility class for the GUI (Graphical User Interface), supporting a project's GUI with several static methods.

  • Method Details

    • blockingConfirmDlg

      public static void blockingConfirmDlg(String message, String title)
      Blocks the current thread until a information message dialog is confirmed. Uses SwingUtilities.invokeAndWait() and JOptionPane.showMessageDialog() to do this.
      Parameters:
      message - the message
      title - the title of the dialog
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if called on the event dispatch thread

    • blockingConfirmDlg

      public static void blockingConfirmDlg(String message, String title, int messageType)
      Blocks the current thread until a message dialog is confirmed. Uses SwingUtilities.invokeAndWait() and JOptionPane.showMessageDialog() to do this.
      Parameters:
      message - the message
      title - the title of the dialog
      messageType - the messageType (e.g. JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE)
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if called on the event dispatch thread

    • center

      public static void center(Window window)
      Centers a window (JFrame, JDialog, etc.) on the screen.
      Parameters:
      window - the window object to center

    • enableComponents

      public static void enableComponents(Container container, boolean enable)
      Enable/disable all components of a container recursively.
      Parameters:
      container - the container of the components to enable or disable
      enable - true to enable all components, false otherwise

    • errorDlg

      public static void errorDlg(Component parent, String message, String title)
      Convenience method (short name): show an error dialog.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent component ro null
      message - the message
      title - the title

    • infoDlg

      public static void infoDlg(Component parent, String message, String title)
      Convenience method (short name): show an info dialog.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent component
      message - the message
      title - the title
